attributes.action: If REMAIN win a second EU Referendum, then LEAVE will call for a third.
attributes.additional_details: In response to the petition calling for a second EU Referendum.
attributes.background: To teach the REMAIN campaigners who've spat their dummy's out about Democracy.  If there is to be a second EU Referendum and it is WON by REMAIN.  We should be allowed to request a third Referendum on behalf of LEAVE.  Because, reasons...
